price: [Muusaan] ni jedhe: “lakkisaa! Dhugumatti, Gooftaan kiyya na wajjin jira, Inni [furmaatatti] na qajeelcha.”
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā inna maʿiya rabbī sayahdīni
